root: ^So here we are! 4th floor - here are all the rooms for artists. Your desk is the last one on the left. Feel free to add anything that will make you feel inspired and happy!
^Amazing! Thank you. This rooms look great. Exactly how I imagined!
^Aww, good to know, Rose. Ok, so before our boss, Tom, will show up you must know few girls rules.
^Yeah, don't worry it's just to... Keep us all safe and you know what I mean.
^First rule - do not stay with any guy in this company alone in a closed room.
^Second rule - be nice to Tom, do not try to make him angry.
^Third rule - if you want to voice your idea, make sure that someone gave you permission to do it...
^Some of our boys can be really bossy. But you will learn to ignore it.
